data.eml:eml: Shaoshia, an unusual new cicada genus from Pakistan with the description of a new species (Hemiptera: Cicadidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wei, Cong, Ahmed, Zubair, Rizvi, Syed Anser (2010): Shaoshia, an unusual new cicada genus from Pakistan with the description of a new species (Hemiptera: Cicadidae). Zootaxa 2421: 28-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194499
